Class Entity

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
SuperSmoothMover
Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Animal, Child
public abstract class Entity extends SuperSmoothMover
The Entity is an abstract class that encompasses animals and children.
  • manages the hp mechanics
  • manages physics-y push mechanics
    • Version:
    2024/4/12
    Author:
    Lucas

      • detectNearestEntity

        protected double[] detectNearestEntity(Class type, int detectRadius)
        finds the nearest entity withing radius of the specific class
        Parameters:
        type - The class that is to be found
        detectRadius - The range in which to find enemies
        Returns:
        double[] -- The details (direction, distance) of the enemy found, returns {0, -1} if not found

      • getWounded

        public void getWounded(int dmg, int duration)
        Method to make the entity take DOT damage, classified as "wound"
        Parameters:
        dmg - The damage to be taken every tick (10 acts)
        duration - The length, in acts
